item.title: Get MGN Replication Statistics
item.description: Overview There’s no easy way to retrieve the total volume of data replicated via MGN, so i wrote a wee script. The below Python script fetches data on all source servers replicated to MGN, including disk sizes. It then parses the data and outputs to a CSV file in the local directory. Users can define in the following parameters: Parameter Description Default region The AWS Region eu-west-1 output Name of the CSV output file mgn_data exclude List of Source Server IDs to exclude [] max Maximum number of Source Servers to Parse 100 The script can be found here.
